asset.title: Dataset In Purgatory
asset.description: Except for removing liquidity, no further actions are permitted on this dataset and it will not be returned in any search. For more details go to [list-purgatory](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/list-purgatory).

account.title: Account In Purgatory
account.description: No further actions are permitted by this account. For more details go to [list-purgatory](https://github.com/oceanprotocol/list-purgatory).
